  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600

      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x54
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 758x54
          text run at (0,0) width 758: "Colgroups are used to identify column groups. The table below has two distinct column groups; 'Airport Location' and"
          text run at (0,18) width 740: "'Car Rental Information'. The first column group contains two columns and the second column group contains three"
          text run at (0,36) width 59: "columns."

          text run at (0,0) width 250: "Text in the cells should be left-aligned."
